title: Random Disconnects?
body: So, for the past week about, I haven't been able to play a full game of league. At about 15 minutes in, every single game, I randomly disconnect, and when I reconnect, I'll be able to play for about another minute then I will be forced to dc again for some reason. Anyone have any similar problems or solutions? I currently have ATT Internet (Sadly all they have in my current area). And every other game works fine. It's just league that is doing this to me.

replies.body: If that's happening on the clock every 15 min and then a min after each time, it might have something to do with your ISP. Let's go ahead and take a look at what that connection looked like after leaving your network though just in case. Grab some recent network logs and have our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) scan them, then take a screenshot of what it shows and post it here so I can look over it with you!
